alert.note: Alert for Morris; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 3:17AM EDT until March 14 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Warren and Morris. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
